quote: A clear conscience is the sure sign of a bad memory. – Mark Twain
fact: To escape the grip of a crocodile`s jaws, push your thumbs into its eyeballs - it will let you go instantly.
joke: I accidentally drank a bottle of invisible ink. Now I’m in hospital, waiting to be seen.
